CustomField.description: Display assignment type and number of assignments per assignment type as csv.
CustomField.formula: If( cgc_sync__Assignment_to_All__c = 0 && cgc_sync__Assignment_to_User__c = 0, 'Not assigned', If( cgc_sync__Assignment_to_All__c > 0, 'All', '') & If( cgc_sync__Assignment_to_All__c > 0 && cgc_sync__Assignment_to_User__c > 0, ', ', '') & If( cgc_sync__Assignment_to_User__c > 0, 'User(' & Text(cgc_sync__Assignment_to_User__c) & ')', ''))
CustomField.label: Assignment
